scripts.start: dep=us npm run fetch-assets && ng serve
scripts.build: npm run build-dev && npm run build-prod
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-dev-id && npm run build-dev-us
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prod-id && npm run build-prod-us
scripts.build-dev-id: dep=id npm run fetch-assets && ng build --env=dev-id --output-path='dist/dev-id'
scripts.build-dev-us: dep=us npm run fetch-assets && ng build --env=dev-us --output-path='dist/dev-us'
scripts.build-dev-in: dep=in npm run fetch-assets && ng build --env=dev-in --output-path='dist/dev-in'
scripts.build-prod-id: dep=id npm run fetch-assets && ng build --env=prod-id --output-path='dist/prod-id'
scripts.build-prod-us: dep=us npm run fetch-assets && ng build --env=prod-us --output-path='dist/prod-us'
scripts.build-prod-in: dep=in npm run fetch-assets && ng build --env=prod-in --output-path='dist/prod-in'
scripts.build-prod-ngsw: npm run build-prod-us && node_modules/.bin/ngsw-config dist ./src/ngsw-config.json && cp node_modules/@angular/service-worker/ngsw-worker.js ./dist/ngsw-worker.js
